Options:

B. Naezy
C. DIVINE

Answer: A) Akhtar, B) Naezy, C) DIVINE, D) Nas

Question: Which statements accurately describe the relationships among the MCs and hip-hop culture?
Options:
A. Naezy is one of the Mumbai based MCs.
B. DIVINE is part of the hip-hop culture.
C. MCs contribute to the hip-hop culture.
D. Both Naezy and DIVINE are part of the hip-hop culture.
Answer: A) Naezy is one of the Mumbai based MCs., B) DIVINE is part of the hip-hop culture., C) MCs contribute to the hip-hop culture., D) Both Naezy and DIVINE are part of the hip-hop culture.
